/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the city's daily life. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars and buses are seen in motion, adding to the dynamic energy of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
